altername_name: Disney-Pixar A Bug's Life: Disney's Activity Centre
Disney-Pixar A Bug's Life: Disneys Malen und Spielen
name: A Bug's Life: Activity Centre
overview: Laugh and play through the fun-filled world of A Bug's Life! In this exciting Activity Centre from Disney you can take part in loads of fun activities, puzzles and games as well as learn fascinating facts about bugs - all from a bug's point of view! Features: First person perspective 2D Graphics Cartoon Graphics Fantasy theme.
